desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 11th International Workshop on Reachability Problems, RP 2017, held in London, UK, in September 2017. The 12 full papers presented together with 1 invited paper were carefully reviewed and selected from 17 submissions.
title: Reachability Problems: 11th International Workshop, RP 2017, London, UK, September 7-9, 2017, Proceedings (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
